Glimpse of the Void.name: Glimpse of the Void
Glimpse of the Void.flavor: Your lightest touch grants the creature the true experience of being without existence.
keywords:
Melee touch

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength or Intelligence + 6 vs. Reflex
Glimpse of the Void.attack:
Strength or Intelligence + 6 vs. Reflex
Level 21: Strength or Intelligence + 9 vs. Reflex
Glimpse of the Void.onHit: The target ceases to exist and can take no actions until the start of your next turn. It has line of sight and line of effect to no creature, and no creature has line of sight or line of effect to it. At the start of your next turn, the target reappears in the space it left, or in the nearest available space if that space is occupied.
Glimpse of the Void.aftereffect: The target grants combat advantage to you and your allies until the end of your next turn.

Voidsoul Infliction.name: Voidsoul Infliction
Voidsoul Infliction.flavor: All creatures that near you feel the fatal pull of utter dissolution.
Voidsoul Infliction.effect: You assume the voidsoul infliction stance. Until the stance ends, any enemy that starts its turn within 2 squares of you is dazed until the end of your next turn. The enemy can choose to take 10 psychic damage instead of being dazed.

Wearing the Void.name: Wearing the Void
Wearing the Void.flavor: You are nothing; nothing can pierce you or rend you.
keywords:
Personal

Trigger: You take damage

Effect: You reduce the triggering damage to 0.
Wearing the Void.effect: You reduce the triggering damage to 0.
